video.title: Tree Fu Tom
video.synopsis: This animated series helps children develop motor skills as it follows the adventures of a boy who can transform himself into a magical tree creature.

episodes.synopsis: Tom must bravely lead his friends in search of their "Squizzle" lost in the garden of Rickety McGlum, a spider believed to be mean.
episodes.title: Squizzle Quest

episodes.synopsis: A game of hide-and-seek goes awry when Squirmtum's fear of the dark causes a disaster.
episodes.title: Hide and Squeak

episodes.synopsis: It's the "Biggest Chuckleberry in Treetopolis" contest and Ariela and the Mushas are both determined to win the trophy.
episodes.title: May the Best Berry Win

episodes.synopsis: After one of Zigzoo's magical inventions spectacularly fails, he decides to quit inventing forever.
episodes.title: Zigzoo the Zero

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Twigs are in for a frenzied, roller-coaster day when they swap Spell School for running Ariela's ranch.
episodes.title: So Long Greenhorns!

episodes.synopsis: When Squirmtum falls out with Tom and the other Treelings, the Mushas trick him into helping them with their plan to get magic spell books.
episodes.title: With Friends Like These

episodes.synopsis: Tom and his friends decide to help Squirmtum realize his dream of flying, but Squirmtum's overexcitement leads to catastrophe.
episodes.title: Winging It

episodes.synopsis: Twigs causes trouble when he uses a magic pebble to grant his every wish. Worse still, a magic pebble in the hands of the Mushas could spell disaster.
episodes.title: Wishful Thinking

episodes.synopsis: When Zigzoo hastily builds a robot to help him with his jobs, it quickly causes more problems than it solves.
episodes.title: Zigzoo's Robot

episodes.synopsis: The Mushas -- Puffy and Stink -- trick Tom and Twigs into carrying out their mischievous plans to mess up Treetop Castle.
episodes.title: Fungus Among Us

episodes.synopsis: When Tom and Twigs break Treetog's Casting Crystal due to their conflicting approaches, there's a race against time to find a replacement.
episodes.title: Crystal Catastrophe

episodes.synopsis: When a colony of hungry bees moves into the ranch, Ariela’s unwillingness to share her nectar spells disaster for everyone.
episodes.title: Buzzworthy

episodes.synopsis: It's the day of Ariela’s Rip-Roaring Rodeo Show and, despite having far too much to do, she won't let anyone help her.
episodes.title: The Big Ranch Rodeo

episodes.synopsis: Ariela's impatience causes trouble. When Zigzoo creates an invention to help Ariela grow crops super fast, everyone gets more than they bargain for.
episodes.title: Not So Fast

episodes.synopsis: Tom and friends' greed for the tasty "Treefle" treats growing all over Treetopolis for just one day leads to trouble.
episodes.title: Treefle Tom

episodes.synopsis: It’s the annual Tidy Up in Treetopolis and Tom's careless cleaning efforts lead to disaster. Gray, polluted sap seeps everywhere.
episodes.title: Tom's Big Mess

episodes.synopsis: Tom leads his under-performing Squizzle team on a quest to find the "Enchanted Squizzle" to help them play perfectly.
episodes.title: One for All!

episodes.synopsis: Tom's attempts to attain perfection cause problems for rare Treetopolis visitors: the Humblebugs.
episodes.title: Hovering Humblebugs

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Twig's friendship isn’t the only thing threatened when Twigs gets a pet called Grubbles. Impatient to play, Twigs casts a spell on Grubbles.
episodes.title: Grubble Trouble

episodes.synopsis: When the impulsive behavior of Tom and friends gets them into trouble it's up to Rickety, with his more thoughtful approach, to leap to the rescue.
episodes.title: A Rickety Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Treelings and Mushas are thrown together to compete in Treetopolis's annual treasure hunt with disastrous results.
episodes.title: Treasure Hunt

episodes.synopsis: Preparations for Sap Day are thrown into turmoil as the Mushas decide to change it to "Stink Day" with stinky fungi that put the smeller to sleep.
episodes.title: Sappy Day

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Twigs get a crash course in being ranchers as they have to lead an epic baby beetle drive with only their wits and a whistle to help them.
episodes.title: The Great Journey

episodes.synopsis: Tom has to tackle titanic troubles in Treetopolis as he is accidentally shrunk to the size of Twigs's toes!
episodes.title: Tiny Tom

episodes.synopsis: Zigzoo invents a weather machine to create perfect conditions for each of his friends, and catastrophe ensues when he tries to keep everyone happy.
episodes.title: Weather Bother

episodes.synopsis: Tom creates catastrophe when he loses the magic sapstone from his belt, and a calm, quiet pond creature accidentally absorbs it.
episodes.title: The Lost Stone

episodes.synopsis: Twigs's hands, feet and ears grow to enormous size when he eats Ariela's Booster-berries, but it's nothing compared to the scolding he expects.
episodes.title: Twigs' Big Boost

episodes.synopsis: Zigzoo scrambles to make all the spincakes -- magical pancakes that float on air -- for this year's Spincake Day celebration.
episodes.title: Spincake Day

episodes.synopsis: Tom must try to prevent pesky ants from stealing all the food and berries during the Treetopolis Harvest Festival.
episodes.title: Harvest Antics

episodes.synopsis: When some sprites start a fan club for Tom, all the attention distracts him from his friends when they need his help.
episodes.title: Tom's Fan Club

episodes.synopsis: When Tom loses his beloved teddy bear, his backyard search for it becomes an epic adventure to rival all his others.
episodes.title: Tom's Teddy

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Twigs find an old race car and enter it against the Mushas in Treetopolis's prestigious Conkerball Run.
episodes.title: Conkerball Run

episodes.synopsis: Everyone's having fun playing pranks, but when the Mushas' trick on the Treelings goes too far, Tom and Twigs get the blame.
episodes.title: Bad Tom

episodes.synopsis: Zigzoo starts out building a train to help Squirmtum in the sap caverns but ends up turning it into a roller coaster.
episodes.title: The Cavern Coaster

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Twigs encounter a giant woodgrub when they look for the source of treequakes that have been rocking Treetop Castle.
episodes.title: Woodgrubs

episodes.synopsis: Tom uses his magical powers to make himself funny at the Treetopolis carnival, with some unexpected results.
episodes.title: Chuckleberry Tom

episodes.synopsis: The Tree Fu Rangers set out to earn their Fungus Finder badges, but things take an unexpected turn when the Mushas sabotage the mission.
episodes.title: Ranger Tom: Fungus Finder

episodes.synopsis: When Ariela's grub Glowy embarks on a journey to find magical bubble roots, she's mystically transformed into a wild creature.
episodes.title: Don't Go Glowy

episodes.synopsis: When they both run out of Squizzles, Twigs and the Mushas must learn to cooperate on a journey to the Fungus Forest for new ones.
episodes.title: The Last Squizzle

episodes.synopsis: An impatient Tom must learn how to cast magic spells all over again when his powers mysteriously stop working.
episodes.title: Tom's Big Spell

episodes.synopsis: Squirmtum believes a sapstone belt will give him magical powers like Tom, but he finds he doesn't have the Tree Fu skills to go with them.
episodes.title: Super Squirmtum

episodes.synopsis: The citizens of Treetopolis get more than they bargain for when the Great Gnomestool unleashes a magic golden spore that grants each of them a wish.
episodes.title: The Golden Spore

episodes.synopsis: In their eagerness to earn their Super Helper badges, Tom and Twigs end up trying to do too much for others and end up helping no one.
episodes.title: Ranger Tom: Super Helper

episodes.synopsis: Tom comes to the rescue when annoying singing weeds start sprouting up all over Treetopolis on a day that's already miserably hot.
episodes.title: Tom and the Warble Weeds

episodes.synopsis: Zigzoo discovers a new fungus with odd powers while putting the finishing touches on his Fungopedia project for the Tree Fu Rangers.
episodes.title: Ranger Tom: Fun Guy!

episodes.synopsis: When Chezz teases him about his size, Twigs enlists Tom's help in proving that he can do anything a bigger sprite can do.
episodes.title: Twigs' Tall Tale

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Twigs plant carrots that end up growing to gargantuan size, and Zigzoo makes things worse by sending the carrots airborne.
episodes.title: Ranger Tom and the Carrots of Doom

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Twigs are eager pupils when Treetog teaches them a new spell that brings to life anything drawn on a magic scroll.
episodes.title: Picture This

episodes.synopsis: Tom investigates when several items go missing from Treetopolis and finds they've all been used in Zigzoo's latest invention.
episodes.title: Dragon Fruit Fiasco

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Twigs have their work cut out for them when the Rangers announce three new badges: Trail Tracker, Baking with Magic and Speedy Harvester.
episodes.title: Ranger Tom: A Badge Too Far

episodes.synopsis: When Stink stumbles upon the Golden Crown of Greatness, he becomes king of Treetopolis, a role that everyone but Tom seems to honor.
episodes.title: King Stink

episodes.synopsis: The citizens of Treetopolis prepare for Winterfest, their version of Christmas, and Twigs prepares a special holiday surprise for Tom.
episodes.title: The Sprite Before Christmas
